Name:
Milwaukee
Murmansk
Milwaukee
Fate:
Loaned to the Soviet Union, 20 April 1944
Returned to the United States, 16 March 1949
Sold for scrap, 10 December 1949
Range: 6,500 nmi (12,000 km; 7,500 mi) at 10 knots (19 km/h; 12 mph)
Armament:
2 × twin, 8 × single 6 in (152 mm) guns
4 × single 3 in (76 mm) anti-aircraft guns
10 × 21 in (533 mm) torpedo tubes
224 mines
Armor:
Belt: 3 inches (76 mm)
Deck: 1.5 inches (38 mm)
Conning tower: 1.5 inches (38 mm)
Bulkheads: 1.5–3 inches (38–76 mm)
